statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior='active';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE targeted_campaign IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'impulsive';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, targeted_campaign FROM customers WHERE targeted_campaign IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal' AND targeted_campaign = 'holiday';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, buying_behavior, targeted_campaign FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'impulsive' OR targeted_campaign = 'new_product' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior='loyal';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE customer_id=1001;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal' AND customer_name LIKE '%a%';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'seniors' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'impulsive' AND customer_name <> 'John' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, buying_behavior FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) OR customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC, buying_behavior ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior='loyal';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior='impulsive' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_customer_behavior, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal' ORDER BY name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York'
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_segment = 'Premium' AND customer_age < 40
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount > 20.00;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price <= 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
